main_definition: A person who applies for a job, position, or nomination.

meanings_and_examples.definition: One who is seeking election to public office
meanings_and_examples.example: The three candidates running for mayor are John Doe, Jane Smith, and Alex Johnson.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person applying for a job or position
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of experience in the industry, Mike is excited to submit his resume as a candidate for a senior management role.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual who has applied for admission to an educational institution
meanings_and_examples.example: Sarah submitted her application to be considered as a student candidate at Harvard University.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A participant in an event or competition
meanings_and_examples.example: During the talent show, all contestants eagerly awaited their turn on stage. They were both nervous and excited to compete for the title of 'Best Candidate'.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who expresses his/her opinion or views openly
meanings_and_examples.example: The journalist asked for candidacy from all parties involved, hoping to hear their unfiltered thoughts and perspectives.
